name: Butler With a Gun
description:
A game about a butler slave that has to feed his master in order to survive.

You have to get the burgers in the cart and bring them to the master as soon as possible to calm him down. 

Be careful to not fill the cart too much since it may become hard to drive. And be aware that you are not alone. The cooks that prepared those delicious burgers don't like stealers.

See LDJAM 49 entry.
